General.Name: Zhejiang Shapuaisi Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Shapuaisi Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of pharmaceutical products. The company provides its products to ophthalmology, antimicrobials, gynecology, and other classes. It offers its products in injections, oral solutions, eye drops, tablets, capsules, and other dosage forms. Zhejiang Shapuaisi Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is based in Pinghu, China.
